data.name: Leashed Soul
data.detailed_description:
Leashed Soul is a casual, family-friendly 3D adventure game of tricky logic puzzles with high quality graphics and effects, and an interesting plot. The quest takes place in a wonderful fantasy world with changing seasons where you have to be smart to save the world.
It all starts like a fairy tale. Beydo, the wooden doll comes to life and escapes from his creator to start on a mission. He advances through 50 exciting levels of tricky logic puzzles to have all the magical seeds so he can plant trees all over the world.
During his emotional journey, Beydo has to tackle obstacles of different difficulty and only you can make him succeed. Join him on his quest to reach all the magical seeds in a maze-like world full of blocks and adventures, and plant trees to make the world a better and greener place. Although the game has handy system of controls, but don’t ever think your quest will be that easy! You have to beat all the levels of the dark and lifeless winter just like those of the hopeful spring.
Have fun with our wooden boy and help him reach his goal: to save the Earth from becoming a bleak place without trees and forests.
Our game was inspired by the most popular puzzle games out there, but we added a unique, loveable story and touch to them.

During his emotional journey, Beydo has to tackle obstacles of different difficulty and only you can make him succeed. Join him on his quest to reach all the magical seeds in a maze-like world full of blocks and adventures, and plant trees to make the world a better and greener place. Have fun with our wooden boy and help him reach his goal: to save the Earth from becoming a bleak place without trees and forests.

data.short_description: Use your imagination! How grateful would you be if you got the biggest and best present you could dream of? When Beydo, the wooden doll comes to life he starts on a mission that spans through 50 different levels and different seasons to thank his gift by planting trees and creating life. Embark on an exciting puzzle adventure!
data.reviews:
“We gave an interview to IGN @BarCraft Budapest”
10 – IGN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Athlon X2, Celeron D
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Phenom II X4, Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600, Radeon HD2400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 750M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 7.0, Steam OS, Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Athlon X2, Celeron D
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Sound Card: Integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 8.0, Steam OS, Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Phenom II X4, Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 750M
  • Sound Card: Integrated
